"Let's do hands-on training together!":
"I have always been inexperienced and immature.
But thanks to Professor's guidance,
I have finally reached the stage of hands-on training!
I have always been taken care of by Professor,
and I am thinking of also getting Professor's guidance
during the hands-on training!
Please come with me to the hands-on training!
※Kill a Lv.60 or higher Garongo by attacking
the stomach, while traveling with Ruberto only.
Recommended quest: Greenscape Probe"

"ずっと未熟だった自分ですが
先生のご指導のおかげもあって
ついに実地研修まで至りました！
先生には常々お世話になっていますが
実地研修での指導も、是非先生に
お願いしたいと考えています！
どうか、実地研修へのご同行を！
※ルベルトのみ同行、Lv.60以上のガロンゴ
の腹を攻撃してトドメを刺す
推奨クエスト：森林探索"
"ルベルトのパートナーカード"
